head.title: Create tables in {{FileFormatUp}} documents with {{ProgLang}}
head.description: The {{ProdFullName}} API allows developers to effortlessly add and populate tables in documents and emails with data from dynamic sources.

header.title: Generate data tables in {{FileFormatUp}} documents using our {{EnvNameShort}} API
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} makes it easy to dynamically fill tables in {{FileFormatUp}} documents with data from various sources.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: {{ProdFullName}} Overview
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is built to create documents and reports by filling templates with data from multiple sources. Effortlessly insert structured data into tables, lists, and charts, or embed images dynamically. Advanced syntax ensures accurate data placement. Supports over 50 formats, including PDFs, MS Office documents, and email files.

more_features.title: Generate documents with dynamic tables
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} streamlines document creation by automating table population and supporting additional elements like charts, lists, and images through templates and advanced markup.

feature_1.title: Create reports from structured data
feature_1.content: The API processes data from sources such as JSON, XML, and CSV to populate tables in office documents efficiently and accurately.

feature_2.title: Display data visually
feature_2.content: {{ProdShortName}} enables the creation of tables, lists, and charts, along with embedding text, links, and images for professional document design.

feature_3.title: Precisely position table data
feature_3.content: Use LINQ-based syntax to dynamically add table rows and columns. Customize styles, including colors and formatting, programmatically.

feature_4.title: Supports a wide range of formats
feature_4.content: Easily handle popular file formats like MS Office, OpenOffice, PDF, and HTML. Seamlessly insert populated tables into supported document types.

formats.title: Create reports with detailed tables
formats.description: {{EnvName}} enables the creation of comprehensive reports by filling templates with tables and other data elements in over 50 supported formats.

operations.title: Explore key features
operations.description: Our solution simplifies the creation of professional documents with dynamically populated tables and additional elements.

steps.title: How to populate a table in a {{FileFormatUp}} document

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) lets you dynamically populate tables in templates for formats like {{FileFormatUp}}. Insert data from various sources into your tables.
content.step_1: Create a {{FileFormatUp}} template with table placeholders.
content.step_2: Fetch data from any supported source.
content.step_3: Filter the data to include only the required information.
content.step_4: Save the document with the populated table.

code_1.title: How to dynamically populate a data table
code_1.content: This example demonstrates how to fill a table in a {{FileFormatUp}} document using dynamic data.

code_1.comment_2: Specify the file path to the template
code_1.comment_3: Retrieve data from your chosen source
